DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct healthy volunteer investigate effect intraocular pressure 2 week treatment 300mg WELLBUTRIN XL/day .
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Evaluate The Effect Of WELLBUTRIN XL On Intraocular Pressure
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female . Nonsmokers Agree remain clinic time define protocol . Normal ECG . Any serious medical disorder condition . Any history endocrine disorder . Any clinically significant laboratory abnormality . History psychiatric illness . Any history suicidal attempt behavior . Risk factor precipitation angle closure glaucoma elevate IOP . Inability refrain use contact lenses study day , correction require . Selfadministered Beck Depression Inventory II scale total score great 9 , suicide question score great zero . Current past history seizure disorder brain injury ( traumatic diseaserelated ) ; condition , opinion investigator , predispose seizure Women positive serum HCG pregnancy test screening , positive urine pregnancy test admission Unit inhouse period , willing use acceptable method contraception lactate plan become pregnant within three month follow screen visit .
DOC.keyword: WELLBUTRIN XL , intraocular pressure , healthy volunteer
